Texts.Chs: 现在也许你应该建造一所^orange;生化实验台^reset;了，并着手学习化学的奥妙！
Texts.Eng: Now perhaps it's time you created a ^orange;Bio-Chem Lab^reset; and start learning about the wonders of chemistry!

Texts.Chs: ^orange;沙^reset;这种物质在^orange;沙漠星球^reset;上随处可见，别因此而小看它，因为它是^orange;硅^reset;这种宝贵资源的其中一种来源。
Texts.Eng: ^orange;Sand^reset; might get everywhere but it is a valuable source of ^orange;silicon^reset;. It is most abundant on ^orange;desert^reset; biomes.
